answerText: Pearl (Sydenstricker) Buck [or Sai Zhenzhu] [10] Gao Xingjian based this novel on his spiritual journey through rural China after receiving a false diagnosis of cancer.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Yale A + Minnesota A | 19 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Answer some questions about twentieth-century novels set in China, for 10 points each. [10] Wang Lung's wedding begins this author's novel The Good Earth, which forms a trilogy with Sons and A House Divided.
